channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'I survived for 3 days in an air pocket on sunken boat - I could hear friends being eaten alive'
item.description: As families of missing passengers onboard the Bayesian superyacht cling to the air pocket theory, the Mirror takes a look at people who survived underwater in air bubbles

item.title: Toxic chemicals that can cause brain damage found in antique books
item.description: Scientists have discovered they could be toxic and unsafe to handle.

item.title: Mike Lynch missing - Everything we know so far as mystery around superyacht sinking deepens
item.description: Mike Lynch, his 18-year-old daughter Hannah and four other people are missing after the Bayesian yacht sank off the coast of Porticello, Palermo in Italy amid stormy weather

item.title: Pope ‘hiding alien secrets in the Vatican’, UFO campaigner claims
item.description: Extraterrestrial lobbyist Steve Bassett has claimed it is clear the Catholic church knows alien life exists.

item.title: Brit terrified by 'alien' spider encounter in bathroom and vows to leave UK
item.description: A man has gone viral on social media after sharing a video of a 'fully grown alien' spider he found in his bathroom - after making sure to keep all his windows and doors closed

item.title: Woman shares 'miracle' drink that made her period cramps disappear in five minutes
item.description: A woman was left floored after trying a bizarre drink that promised to cure her period cramps, as it completely got rid of them in just five minutes - but it can be tricky to find

item.title: Tesco caught up in 'pervert manager' scam that promises '£750 money off voucher'
item.description: Several videos have emerged on TikTok, each showing a woman claiming to be a Tesco employee and naming a different male "pervert manager" who they say made advances at them
